params.name: inputs
params.description: The pipeline handles three types of images:A string containing an HTTP(S) link pointing to an imageA string containing a local path to an imageAn image loaded in PIL directlyThe pipeline accepts either a single image or a batch of images. Images in a batch must all be in thesame format: all as HTTP(S) links, all as local paths, or all as PIL images.

params.name: threshold
params.description: The probability necessary to make a prediction.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The maximum time in seconds to wait for fetching images from the web. If None, no timeout is set andthe call may block forever.
